name: Rose
description: A classic flower known for its beauty and fragrance.
care-instruction: Water regularly, ensure good drainage, and prune as needed.

name: Tulip
description: Bright and cheerful flowers that bloom in spring.
care-instruction: Water once a week, prefer well-drained soil.

name: Sunflower
description: Large, sunny flowers that grow tall and bright.
care-instruction: Full sun, water regularly, and provide space to grow.

name: Orchid
description: Exotic and elegant flowers with diverse colors.
care-instruction: Indirect light, keep soil moist, and avoid drafts.

name: Lily
description: Fragrant flowers with large, vibrant blooms.
care-instruction: Water when the top inch of soil is dry, full sun to part shade.

name: Daisy
description: Simple, cheerful flowers that are easy to grow.
care-instruction: Full sun, water regularly, and deadhead to prolong blooming.

name: Geranium
description: Colorful flowers with a strong fragrance.
care-instruction: Water when dry, full sun to partial shade.

name: Lavender
description: Fragrant purple flowers that are great for gardens and pots.
care-instruction: Well-drained soil, full sun, and water sparingly.

name: Hydrangea
description: Large clusters of flowers in various colors.
care-instruction: Water regularly, prefer partial shade, and mulch for moisture.

name: Marigold
description: Bright orange and yellow flowers that repel pests.
care-instruction: Full sun, water when dry, and deadhead regularly.

name: Peony
description: Large, fragrant blooms that last long in the garden.
care-instruction: Full sun, water regularly, and avoid heavy pruning.

name: Zinnia
description: Vibrant, daisy-like flowers that attract butterflies.
care-instruction: Full sun, water regularly, and fertilize monthly.

name: Begonia
description: Colorful flowers with glossy foliage.
care-instruction: Partial shade, keep soil moist, and avoid direct sun.

name: Aster
description: Star-shaped flowers that bloom in late summer.
care-instruction: Full sun, well-drained soil, and water regularly.

name: Iris
description: Unique flowers with intricate patterns and vibrant colors.
care-instruction: Full sun to partial shade, water moderately.

name: Dahlia
description: Large, showy flowers in a range of colors.
care-instruction: Full sun, water regularly, and provide support if needed.

name: Snapdragon
description: Tall spikes of flowers in various colors.
care-instruction: Full sun, water regularly, and pinch back to promote branching.

name: Pansy
description: Cool-weather flowers with expressive faces.
care-instruction: Partial shade to full sun, water regularly, and protect from extreme heat.

name: Fig Tree
description: Produces sweet figs that are excellent for eating fresh or dried.
care-instruction: Full sun, well-drained soil, and water when dry.

name: Banana
description: Sweet, creamy fruit that's great for snacking.
care-instruction: Keep in a cool, dry place; ripens best at room temperature.

name: Apple
description: Crisp and juicy fruit available in various colors.
care-instruction: Store in a cool, dry place; refrigerate for longer freshness.

name: Mango
description: Sweet, tropical fruit that's perfect for smoothies.
care-instruction: Store at room temperature until ripe, then refrigerate.

name: Orange
description: Citrusy fruit high in vitamin C, great for juicing.
care-instruction: Keep in a cool, dry place; refrigerate for longer freshness.

name: Grapes
description: Sweet, juicy clusters perfect for snacking.
care-instruction: Store in the fridge and wash before eating.

name: Pineapple
description: Tropical fruit with a sweet and tart flavor.
care-instruction: Store at room temperature until ripe, then refrigerate.

name: Peach
description: Sweet, juicy fruit with a fuzzy skin.
care-instruction: Store in a cool place; refrigerate for longer freshness.

name: Strawberry
description: Sweet red berries perfect for desserts or snacking.
care-instruction: Keep refrigerated; wash before eating.

name: Blueberry
description: Tiny, sweet berries high in antioxidants.
care-instruction: Keep refrigerated; wash before eating.
